summary: The module defines comprehensive test suites for the PixArt Sigma image generation pipeline, including fast unit tests that verify core inference behavior, shape handling, embedding usage, batch processing, component serialization, and CPU offloading, as well as integration tests that assess the pipeline across various resolution settings and optional resolution binning.
business_intent: Validate and maintain the correctness, performance, and robustness of the PixArt Sigma pipeline to ensure reliable image generation for downstream applications and prevent regressions during development.
